Halucigen stood loiking all around him.  He opened a comm 
directly to Galvatrons brain.  This comm link is differenet then 
others, for it is a voice driectly inside them, but the other can 
ignore it and not allow it in.  "Let me in, I must speak to you Dark 
Lord" the voice said in Galvatrons head.  Galvatron could choose to 
block it and he couldn't talk to him or let Halucigen into his mind to 
talk.
